short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Todo List with Calendar. You can add and remove todo items and see the calendar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension features a simple and straightforward interface. It also offers two themes: dark and light. With the built-in calendar, you can create tasks for specific days and view your past tasks. Additionally, it includes a star effect in the background.
